title: MGS1 Smash Snake
author: RLC, Cuba and Shigu
short_desc: Age hasn't slowed you down one bit!
long_desc:
Head from Shigu's MGS4 Snake port, presumably from MrGameboy20XX's rip.
Body ripped by ckthesorrow
Original base kitbashed by Cuba
Vest mesh and texture from Smash 2
Face normals by FrankensteinKappa
Texture samples from UE4 remake museum of Metal Gear Solid

Special thanks to TrikzMe for the specular textures.

title: Fallout Gear Solid
author: BobDoleOwndU
short_desc:
Mods... mods never change....

Replaces Snake's head with a power armor helmet.
long_desc:
Mods... mods never change....

Replaces Snake's head with a power armor helmet.

title: Isaboom
author: BobDoleOwndU
long_desc:
A claymore can be a friend too!

Replaces claymores with Isabelle from Animal Crossing.

title: YongYea
author: BobDoleOwndU, Chelly, and OldBoss
short_desc: Replaces the bandana with the Yongdana, replaces the Tiger Stripe camo with a Yong camo and changes the title screen to a Yong theme.
long_desc: Replaces the bandana with the Yongdana, replaces the Tiger Stripe camo with a Yong camo and changes the title screen to a Yong theme.

title: Venomegumin
author: BobDoleOwndU
long_desc:
Kaz(uma), I'm already a (Crimson) Demon.
Replaces the bandana with Megumin's hat.
